abstract: ChannelAdvisor, an 8-year-old maker of on-demand software that helps retailers sell goods through Amazon, Shopzilla and eBay, on Tuesday announced $30 million in fresh funding to expand into new markets.
lead_paragraph: ChannelAdvisor, an 8-year-old maker of on-demand software that helps retailers sell goods through Amazon, Shopzilla and eBay, on Tuesday announced $30 million in fresh funding to expand into new markets.

headline.main: ChannelAdvisor Tunes in $30 Million in Funding
